Text:
you are the king....
thank you one more time...
great sound...
please don't stop....i need you....
thank you very much for the great stuff of the man!!!
TCB retroa! Great work you're doin!!

Great! The flutes on "My Way" are fantastic! And on "It's Over"! So much more depth now, and Elvis' voice even has more nuance. Listening to "It's Over" now and hearing things I have never heard before! Fantastic! I hope you are still active and see these comments. I am a loooong time Elvis fan. It takes a lot to get me to appreciate this album again, but you really revealed a much much better album than I thought was there!

absolutely stellar copy Retro!  thank you very much for the copy and especially in full Wave Format...Ron Tutt is crisp as a bell!...from one audiophile to another, thank you brother!!!

Peace,
Audiohead22
